description: Parameters for Cribl destination ID naming convention

notes.IDprefix: Prefix for the Cribl destination ID (e.g., 'azure_sentinel_')
notes.IDsuffix: Suffix for the Cribl destination ID (e.g., '_dest')
notes.authentication: Azure AD authentication details (tenantId, clientId) are stored in azure-parameters.json. Client secret is set to '<replace me>' placeholder for manual configuration in Cribl Stream.
